primevc.gui.styling.EffectsStyle

class
extends
StyleSubBlock
Class holding all style properties for effects.

filledProperties(default,null) : Int

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlockBase

hide(getHide,setHide) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the 'hide' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'show' effect if it's playing.

listeners(default,null) : haxe.FastList_primevc_core_traits_IInvalidateListener

inherited from primevc.core.traits.Invalidatable

move(getMove,setMove) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the coordinates of the targets layoutobject have changed.

owner(default,setOwner) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleSubBlock

resize(getResize,setResize) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the size of targets layoutobject is changed.

rotate(getRotate,setRotate) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the 'rotate' method of the target is called.

scale(getScale,setScale) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the 'scale' method of the target is called.

show(getShow,setShow) : EffectType

Effect that is performed when the 'show' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'hide' effect if it's playing.

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

overrides primevc.gui.styling.StyleSubBlock
Method is called when a property in the super- or extended-style is changed. If the property is not set in this style-object, it means that the allFilledPropertiesFlag needs to be changed..
